name: Senior Software Engineer (IntelliJ Product Analytics)
description:
IntelliJ IDEA is our smart IDE for Java and other programming languages, which we've been developing and perfecting for many years. IntelliJ IDEA drives innovation in software development, making hundreds of thousands of developers worldwide more productive.

In a modern world, it’s essential to understand how the product is used, which features are more and which are less important. We’ve achieved that by implementing anonymous feature usage statistics which is now an irreplaceable part of IntelliJ development. Various IntelliJ teams use it every day to make product decisions. Improving this system is not a simple task, taking into account a variety of IntelliJ IDEA usage patterns and the fact that it is a desktop application and is executed in an environment outside of our control.

We are looking for a senior software engineer to help us improve our feature usage statistics system.

As part of our team, you will:

  • Make reporting IntelliJ usage statistics more reliable and precise without compromising data anonymity.
  • Contribute to the development of the IntelliJ Platform.
  • Implement and improve internal libraries for data reporting, validation, and anonymization.

Requirements:

  • Solid experience with Java or Kotlin in production.
  • Experience with designing an API.
  • Strong knowledge of algorithms and data structures.
  • Ability to work both as a part of the team and independently.
  • Strong communication skills.
